  • Deprecated Classes
    Class
    Description
    org.apache.avro.ipc.SocketServer
    use SaslSocketServer instead.
    org.apache.avro.ipc.SocketTransceiver
    use SaslSocketTransceiver instead.
    org.apache.avro.reflect.MapEntry
    Use org.apache.avro.util.MapEntry
  • Deprecated Fields
    Field
    Description
    org.apache.avro.idl.IdlLexer.tokenNames
    Use IdlLexer.VOCABULARY instead.
    org.apache.avro.idl.IdlParser.tokenNames
    Use IdlParser.VOCABULARY instead.
  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    org.apache.avro.compiler.specific.SpecificCompiler.javaUnbox(Schema)
    use javaUnbox(Schema, boolean), kept for backward compatibility of custom templates
    org.apache.avro.generic.GenericDatumReader.createFixed(Object, byte[], Schema)
    As of Avro 1.6.0 this method has been moved to GenericData.createFixed(Object, byte[], Schema)
    org.apache.avro.generic.GenericDatumReader.createFixed(Object, Schema)
    As of Avro 1.6.0 this method has been moved to GenericData.createFixed(Object, Schema)
    org.apache.avro.generic.GenericDatumReader.newRecord(Object, Schema)
    As of Avro 1.6.0 this method has been moved to GenericData.newRecord(Object, Schema)
    org.apache.avro.idl.IdlLexer.getTokenNames()
    org.apache.avro.idl.IdlParser.getTokenNames()
    org.apache.avro.io.DecoderFactory.createBinaryDecoder(byte[], int, int, BinaryDecoder)
    use DecoderFactory.binaryDecoder(byte[], int, int, BinaryDecoder) instead
    org.apache.avro.io.DecoderFactory.createBinaryDecoder(byte[], BinaryDecoder)
    use DecoderFactory.binaryDecoder(byte[], BinaryDecoder) instead
    org.apache.avro.io.DecoderFactory.createBinaryDecoder(InputStream, BinaryDecoder)
    use the equivalent DecoderFactory.binaryDecoder(InputStream, BinaryDecoder) instead
    org.apache.avro.io.DecoderFactory.defaultFactory()
    use the equivalent DecoderFactory.get() instead
    org.apache.avro.ipc.Requestor.readError(Schema, Decoder)
    org.apache.avro.ipc.Requestor.readResponse(Schema, Decoder)
    org.apache.avro.ipc.specific.SpecificRequestor.getDatumReader(Schema)
    org.apache.avro.mapred.AvroMultipleOutputs.getCollector(String, Reporter)
    Use AvroMultipleOutputs.collect(java.lang.String, org.apache.hadoop.mapred.Reporter, java.lang.Object) method for collecting output
    org.apache.avro.Protocol.createMessage(String, String, Schema)
    org.apache.avro.Protocol.createMessage(String, String, Schema, Schema, Schema)
    org.apache.avro.Protocol.getUnresolvedTypes()
    can return invalid schemata: do NOT use!
    org.apache.avro.Schema.createRecord(List<Schema.Field>)
    This method allows to create Schema objects that cannot be parsed by SchemaParser.parse(CharSequence). It will be removed in a future version of Avro. Better use Schema.createRecord(String, String, String, boolean, List) to produce a fully qualified Schema.
    org.apache.avro.Schema.getNameValidator()
    org.apache.avro.Schema.getValidateDefaults()
    org.apache.avro.Schema.parse(File)
    use SchemaParser instead.
    org.apache.avro.Schema.parse(InputStream)
    use SchemaParser instead.
    org.apache.avro.Schema.parse(String)
    use SchemaParser instead.
    org.apache.avro.Schema.parse(String, boolean)
    use SchemaParser instead.
    org.apache.avro.Schema.Parser.addTypes(Map<String, Schema>)
    use addTypes(Iterable types)
    org.apache.avro.Schema.setNameValidator(NameValidator)
    org.apache.avro.Schema.setValidateDefaults(boolean)
    org.apache.avro.Schema.toString(boolean)
    Use SchemaFormatter.format(Schema) instead, using the format json/pretty or json/inline
    org.apache.avro.Schema.toString(Collection<Schema>, boolean)
    org.apache.avro.SchemaParser.resolve(SchemaParser.ParseResult)
    org.apache.avro.util.Utf8.getLength()
    call Utf8.getByteLength() instead.
    org.apache.avro.util.Utf8.setLength(int)
    call Utf8.setByteLength(int) instead.

    - use the Constructors that take a ConnectionFactory
